channel.title: 639 - Winter Storage
channel.description: Hello everyone I could use some help lol. I just finished adding summoning, so far all my npcs summon correctly and all scrolls work except one. The only thing I don't have is winter storage. Does anyone have the code and where I need to put it, etc for the winter storage scroll? ( the pack yak special move that banks whatever item you choose)

item.title: 639 - Winter Storage
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

Lol well I know it would go into Object on item handler and to make a case for it etc etc, I just don’t know the proper code I should use

Read full topic

item.title: 639 - Winter Storage
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Sure, let me give that right to you and show you exactly where to properly place it. Attempt it and run into a problem; once you do come back and post the problem(s).

Read full topic
